trans-unit.source: Initiates a Browse For Folder dialog.

seg-source.mrk: Initiates a Browse For Folder dialog.

target.mrk: Initiates a Browse For Folder dialog.

trans-unit.source: Root directory of GUI file tree. It limits a choice in the root folder. Use "" for Desktop to be root.

seg-source.mrk: Root directory of GUI file tree.
It limits a choice in the root folder.
Use "" for Desktop to be root.

target.mrk: Root directory of GUI file tree.
It limits a choice in the root folder.
Use "" for Desktop to be root.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The full path of the folder you selected/highlighted when displaying dialogue (if it exists in the root folder). Default is blank ("").

seg-source.mrk: The full path of the folder you selected/highlighted when displaying dialogue (if it exists in the root folder).

target.mrk: The full path of the folder you selected/highlighted when displaying dialogue (if it exists in the root folder).

trans-unit.source: [optional] The window handle to use as the parent for this dialog.

seg-source.mrk: The window handle to use as the parent for this dialog.

target.mrk: The window handle to use as the parent for this dialog.

trans-unit.source: the full path of the folder chosen.

seg-source.mrk: the full path of the folder chosen.

target.mrk: the full path of the folder chosen.

trans-unit.source: "" (empty string) and sets the @error flag to 1 if user cancels/closes the window.

seg-source.mrk: "" (empty string) and sets the @error flag to 1 if user cancels/closes the window.

target.mrk: "" (empty string) and sets the @error flag to 1 if user cancels/closes the window.

trans-unit.source: The root dir will be chosen if the initial dir (if given) does not exist.

seg-source.mrk: The root dir will be chosen if the initial dir (if given) does not exist.

target.mrk: The root dir will be chosen if the initial dir (if given) does not exist.

trans-unit.source: A nonexistent root dir will also cause the Desktop folder to be root.

seg-source.mrk: A nonexistent root dir will also cause the Desktop folder to be root.

target.mrk: A nonexistent root dir will also cause the Desktop folder to be root.

trans-unit.source: Special Windows folders (such as "My Documents") can be set as root by using the right CLSID detailed in the Appendix.

seg-source.mrk: Special Windows folders (such as "My Documents") can be set as root by using the right CLSID detailed in the Appendix.

target.mrk: Special Windows folders (such as "My Documents") can be set as root by using the right CLSID detailed in the Appendix.

trans-unit.source: UNC paths are not supported. If you think that user's may choose files on a UNC path then the path needs to be mapped as a drive first.

seg-source.mrk: If you think that user's may choose files on a UNC path then the path needs to be mapped as a drive first.

target.mrk: If you think that user's may choose files on a UNC path then the path needs to be mapped as a drive first.

trans-unit.source: The new vista+ dialog style is used if possible, regardless of the Use New Dialog Style flag. With the vista dialog style the edit control and create folder buttons are always shown, ignoring the flags parameter, and the dialog text parameter sets the title of the window.

seg-source.mrk: The new vista+ dialog style is used if possible, regardless of the Use New Dialog Style flag.
With the vista dialog style the edit control and create folder buttons are always shown, ignoring the flags parameter, and the dialog text parameter sets the title of the window.

target.mrk: The new vista+ dialog style is used if possible, regardless of the Use New Dialog Style flag.
With the vista dialog style the edit control and create folder buttons are always shown, ignoring the flags parameter, and the dialog text parameter sets the title of the window.

trans-unit.source: Create a constant variable in Local scope of the message to display in FileSelectFolder.

seg-source.mrk: Create a constant variable in Local scope of the message to display in FileSelectFolder.

target.mrk: Create a constant variable in Local scope of the message to display in FileSelectFolder.

trans-unit.source: Display an open dialog to select a file.

seg-source.mrk: Display an open dialog to select a file.

target.mrk: Display an open dialog to select a file.
